name: Ankuuuuu
wishText: May the happiness and love always be with you! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! To the person who makes me smile and takes all my worries away? Just a 'its okay snehu and I am proud of you'- fixes my mood.I dont know in what ways I should write a wish, or thank you? All I know is I will pray for you to get the happiness and love you deserve. Your birthday comes exactly 1 day after me , even here you got my back???
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it. And for the matter of sake couldn't get your pic so have to compensate with you fav babiessss
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
